pr_title: worldmap: change from skill level to boosted level for map icons

timeline.message: change from skill level to boosted level for map icons

timeline.bodyText:
While most shortcuts reference your boosted level, not all do. The Crabclaw Caves shortcuts (used in The Depths of Despair quest) require 18 agility to cross, but you cannot boost your agility level to start the quest therefore must have the base level to cross them.
That said this might be too much of an edge case to be worth considering, unless other similar shortcuts exist.
timeline.author: Nightfirecat

replies.bodyText: Ya I am not sure which shortcuts are unboostable or not. Will probably need to come back to this in the future.
replies.author: akhtar-u

replies.bodyText: Based on my experience there's more shortcuts that use boosted level than not, so it's probably better to have it just use the boosted level.
replies.author: Adam-
